doc:lib.member.doc:lib.name: Syntelos.SVG.Library.init
doc:lib.member.doc:desc: Populate the argument element with a display of the current state of the library in 'text' nodes. The argument element is required to have attributes 'x', 'y', and 'font-size'.

doc:return.doc:desc: Boolean for event caller (onload). True for OK, otherwise False.
